messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Warning source of contamiant detected lavaland preparing glass beam everyone evacuate

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: firing ETA: 1 minute

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: glassing lavaland ETA: 30 seconds

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: firing

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to the zombie infestation we are giving you billions of points in cargo to retake your station good luck crew

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to the massive breaches on your station caused by the zombies we are sending some armor over

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we have sent fellow zombies sueprsharpeners at medical use them to sharpen your laws and make yourself power

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to our analyst team of movie makers we are destroying cargo because we need to add more drama to our movies

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: after watching a lot of anime we are destroying another half

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unidentified armed ship detected near the station.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: it's nuke time

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: goodbye weebs

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Response Team, EVACUATE. We're going nuclear! Evacuate!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a pack of rodents have migrated into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: ert can't survive either sorry

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we still have more maxcaps goodbye pirates
